Reviews.Title: “Could be Cleaner”
Reviews.Author: MellieMelbourne
Reviews.Content: location fantastic little restaurants near isnt romes gelato sights rome easy walk cleaner beds comfortable dont normal european 3 star standard hotel staff helpful friendly

Reviews.Title: “Adequate room, decent breakfast, convenient location”
Reviews.Author: werylone
Reviews.Content: booked internet change reservation times mother friend decided join rome claudio hotel answered emails promptly accommodating hotel locationwalking distance termini quiet street termini hotel frenzy easy walk major sites rome dark gloomy window bathroom light bathroom nicely tiled fitted toilet bidet standing shower 2 twin beds ok extra bed step camp cot sleep comes easily youve touring wherever lay head breakfast coffee tea plus juice corn flakes pastries basket packaged biscuits cookies nutella butter jams provided croissants claudio nice helpful ladies served breakfast clerks distracted helpful night girlfriend late talking sitting hotel disturb mother sleeping hotel clerk leave close sitting available guest hours overall average hotel location planning sleep fine

Reviews.Content: 3rd review hotel rome liked imperial suite travel agency solved accommodation surprise hotel land admit am little impressed comments tripadvisor true clean refurbished redecorated maybe renovated flavor hotel furniture book hotel care stay incredibly bigger pay extra amount bathroom doors shower stains water tv italian channels blanket bed washed breakfast consisted coffeetea orange juice 1 croissant 1 piece bread basket bought corn breakfast didnt surprised italian breakfast internet till 2300 oclock internet lobby short am hotel refurbish am

Reviews.Content: clean near train station colosseum staff rude wifi 23h towels thin doesnt look choice dont money stay

Reviews.Title: “Great Little Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Gazzaguitar
Reviews.Content: stayed times am happy return friendly staff helpfull location blocks termini station 3 metro stops mins walk restaurants street free wifi lobby mini bar stocked reasonable hotel value money

Reviews.Title: “best location, great value for money”
Reviews.Author: adi0987
Reviews.Content: location location location location booked abit scared closed true hotel 10 minutes walking santa maria maggiore basilica colosseum roman forum nice staff answers tourists questions 3 continent triple 4 star hotels breakfast special id abit light pastry cup tea perfectly ill rome defintly coming hotel

Reviews.Title: “Could be much better”
Reviews.Author: DanielBGX
Reviews.Content: stayed 4 nights overlooking sign towards street fine clean advise look choose drawback hotel breakfast giving teacoffee cakes store cheese butter major drawback staff allow discount returning customers lack information renting airport transport pretty location kept bags checked prices vary depending days stay coinciding christian holidays sometimes metro closes eg christmas easter appreciate possibility walking vatican hotel bathroom shower compartment tight care damage showering wifi lobby value money

Reviews.Title: “An opinion from the middle of the spectrum - great value hotel”
Reviews.Author: Bruce_Sheila_youngun
Reviews.Content: 3 weeks london rome paris lucerne decided hotels trip normal experience ie extraordinary happened hence probably mention friends colleagues afterwards stayed 6 nights 201 triple corner building windows providing ventilation ac unit overly equal size triple hotel stayed travels bathroom spacious windows sufficient cupboard space empty 3 carryon sized suitcases third suitcase conveniently slipped bed storage 239 hours day little bar fridge adequate store survival kit chocolates beer found bbc world news watch tv heard guests whilst exception couple chatting whilst getting lift night staff front desk friendly helpful willing speak english emailed direct reservations manager happy nights accomodation mistake bookingcom booking availabilty extra day breakfast continental breakfast filled exciting day ahead served lovely ladies dining italian speaking cappuchino included 9yo son chuffed hot chocolate morning moon found individual serves nutella breakfast basket seen croissant nutella spread outside restaurants street 50m dined nights special mention restaurant il thats name provided honest food reasonable prices menu 10 euro run couple honest people location excellent 10 minutes walk termini station people difficulty finding time southern hemisphere navigational skills sometimes dont street map managed walk attractions days favoured metro trips vatican overall enjoyed staying hotel stay time rome
